entry.title: Contract-level Relative Timelocks (or, let's talk about ancestry proofs and singletons)
entry.summary: I'm sorry, but it seems there was an error in the input provided. You mentioned a scenario involving a discussion between @moonsettler and @instagibbs, but no specific details or content about the scenario, email, or the points to be summarized were included in your request. To assist you effectively, could you please provide more context or the actual content that needs to be summarized?
